content:
As discussed on the 2022-02-28 Pharmacy Workgroup call we are proposing the following Block-Vote-1 as a part of STU2 ballot reconciliation for the Da Vinci Formulary IG to be voted on at next weekâ€™s Pharmacy WG meeting (Monday, 2022-03-07).

Jira search string: project = "FHIR Specification Feedback" AND Specification = "US Da Vinci Drug Formulary (FHIR) [FHIR-us-davinci-df]" AND Grouping = Block-Vote-1 AND created >= 2021-12-01

Issue key Summary Resolution Reporter
FHIR-36143 Add invariant to InsurancePlanLocation requiring address or geolocation extension Persuasive Corey Spears
FHIR-36142 Make FormularyItem PharmacyType cardinality 1..* Persuasive Corey Spears
FHIR-36137 Update CapabilityStatement to make Location SHALL Persuasive Corey Spears
FHIR-35365 FormularyItem extensions need descriptive descsriptions Persuasive with Modification Josh Mandel

@Josh Mandel @Corey Spears
